description:
When you've head a creative block at your craft table what do you do to get out of it? If you have extra time to work but no ideas, what do you do? Here I discuss how I handle these issues. Get those creative juices flowing again.

Join us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
tags: How to End a Creative Crafting Slump
title: How to End a Crafting Slump (Episode 016)
